name.baseName: Alumina production ; Alumina for metallurgy ; National average ; Bauxite
氧化铝生产 ; 冶金用氧化铝 ; 全国平均 ; 铝土矿

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: 基于拜耳法、烧结法、联合法等工艺的产量分布所计算的国内氧化铝生产过程二氧化碳排放因子的加权平均值。从铝土矿到氧化铝。

technology.technologicalApplicability: The alumina produced through the Bayer process, sintering process, and combined processes is intended for use in the metallurgy industry. It serves as the primary raw material for aluminum smelting enterprises. The data pertains to the weighted average of CO2 emission factors for alumina production across the nation, considering the distribution of production volumes by different processes, including those from typical regions such as Henan, Shandong, and Guangxi provinces. This alumina is specifically for creating aluminum through electrolysis and other metallurgical processes.
基于拜耳法、烧结法与联合法等工艺产出的氧化铝用于冶金工业，作为铝冶炼企业的主要原料。数据反映了从覆盖各种代表性工艺及产能的全国范围内的氧化铝生产过程中二氧化碳排放因子的加权平均值，特别是河南、山东和广西等典型地区的实际生产状况。该氧化铝主要用于通过电解等冶金工艺生产铝。

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.dataSelectionAndCombinationPrinciples: On the basis of fully sorting out the production situation of alumina and electrolytic aluminum enterprises across the country, and in accordance with the principle of covering all representative processes and production capacities, and taking into full consideration the distribution of production capacities, nature of enterprises and other factors, we focused on selecting typical primary aluminum smelting enterprises in typical regions such as Henan, Shandong and Guangxi, and carried out an in-depth field survey, and formed a database of carbon emission factors for alumina and electrolytic aluminum, with the data of 2011 as the main body. The database of alumina production includes primary and secondary materials. The alumina production database includes four sub-databases: consumption of raw and auxiliary materials and waste generation, process technology and equipment, energy consumption of process materials, and secondary energy production of self-provided cogeneration plants. For details, see Table 1 of the literature sources.

在对全国 氧化铝、电解铝企业生产情况进行充分梳理的基础 上，按照覆盖所有代表性工艺、代表性产能原则，并充 分考虑产能分布、企业性质等因素，重点选择了河南、 山东、广西等典型地区的典型原铝冶炼企业，开展深入实地调研，并形成以 2011 年数据为主体的氧化铝、电解铝碳排放因子数据库。氧化铝生产数据库包括原 辅料消耗及废弃物产生、工艺技术与设备、工序物料 能源消耗、自备热电厂二次能源生产等 4 个子库。详见文献来源表1。

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: 张文娟，李会泉，陈波，李强，韩永鹏 & 孙振华. 我国原铝冶炼行业温室气体排放模型. 环境科学研究 vol. 26 1132–1138 (2013).
张文娟，李会泉，陈波，李强，韩永鹏 & 孙振华. 我国原铝冶炼行业温室气体排放模型. 环境科学研究 vol. 26 1132–1138 (2013).

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: Users of this data set should account for the CO2 emissions exclusively from the defined scope of alumina production, which includes the calcination process of aluminum hydroxide, self-generated electricity and steam production, heating from molten salt furnaces, as well as purchased electricity and lime production. It is crucial to refer to the documented emission factors of 2011 as a baseline for calculations. Furthermore, when applying this LCA data, consider the technological variations and capacity distributions within different enterprises and geographical areas to ensure accurate environmental impact assessment within the context of Chinese alumina production for metallurgy.
使用此数据集的用户应专注于氧化铝生产过程中定义的范围内的二氧化碳排放核算，包括氢氧化铝的焙烧过程、自备的电力与蒸气生产、熔盐炉供热、外购电力及石灰生产。重要的是参考2011年作为计算基线的公布排放因子。此外，在应用此生命周期评估(LCA)数据时，需要考虑不同企业和地理区域内技术差异及产能分布，以确保在中国冶金用氧化铝生产环境影响评估中的准确性。

completeness.common:other: The accounting scope of the alumina production process covers the aluminum hydroxide roasting process, self-provided electricity and steam production, molten salt furnace heating, purchased electricity, and lime production.
氧化铝生产过程核算范 围涵盖氢氧化铝焙烧过程、自备电力与蒸气生产、熔 盐炉供热、外购电力及石灰生产。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses
